masks-newgeneration-unofficial.callerQuote: "Someone's been stealing our honey reserves, but the weird part? A swarm of bees seems to be HELPING the thiefâ€”a small creature in a flat cap. The bees call themselves 'The Beeves'? Our bees are unionized now? Please help."
masks-newgeneration-unofficial.requirementsText:
• Intercept the honey-water heist in progress
  • Understand the Puddles-Beeves alliance
  • Can you negotiate with sentient bees?
